root.name: This Means War!
root.description: This Means War is set in a post-apocalyptic world where a computer virus has destroyed nearly all computer technology. The player works for the United Nations as its military strategist and commands forces against various factions as armies vie for control of technology and land. Examples of the leaders of the factions include, a religious cult leader, a Crodocile Dundee rip-off and a countess.
